column2: Press [E] to remove this dummy target
Leave the Spell Lab\nShift + Left-click to return to the mines intrance
column10: 离开法术实验室\nShift + 左键返回矿井入口

column2: When enabled, in inventory spells are guaranteed compactly aligned,\nno matter how they are laid out in the wand edit panel
column10: 开启后，无论法杖编辑面板中如何排列，法杖中法术总是排列紧凑

column2: Note: Enabling this will make edit panel ignore changes made in vanilla inventory.
column10: 注意：启用此功能将使编辑面板无视原版背包中的更改

column2: Spell Insertion Failed: No enough space in wand
column10: 插入法术失败：法杖中没有足够的空间

column2:
Works with Quick Spell Picker option and Spell Group Box.
When enabled, spells will be put into wand by replacing
When disabled, spells will be put into wand by inserting.
Hold Shift to apply the other way to put spells temporarily.
Tips: When inserting,
    left-click to insert to the right
    right-click to insert to the left
column10:
该选项影响快速装填和法术组合仓库。
开启时，放置法术操作以替换原有法术方式执行。
关闭时，放置法术操作以插入原有法术之间方式执行。
按住 Shift 可暂时使用另一种执行方式。
提示：插入法术时，左键插入选中格的右边，右键插入选中格的左边。

column2:
When enabled, the number of slots in the wand edit panel
is not limited by the actual capacity of the wand
Note: If there are no spells in the wand, the wand's capacity will be adjusted to 0,
making the wand not shown in the vanilla inventory.
This is normal, just continue to edit the wand with automatic capacity enabled.
column10: 开启时，法杖编辑面板按最大行数显示，同时法杖的实际容量自动调整至恰好容下其中法术\n注意：如果法杖中没有法术，法杖的容量会被调整为0，使之无法在原版背包中显示\n此为正常现象，继续使用自动调整容量编辑法杖即可
清除当前施放延迟/充能时间
当前你拥有 $0 + $1 层$2效果

column2: Right-click to spawn boss target dummy
column10: 右键生成 Boss 级伤害测试假人
转化生物为伤害测试假人

column2: Click this button and then press Shift to transform the creature closest to your mouse position
column10: 点击此按钮后，按 Shift 转化离鼠标指针最近的生物
已将 $0 转化为伤害测试假人

column2: Error: No creature found near your mouse position
column10: 错误：鼠标指针附近没有合适的生物

column2: Error: Unable to transform yourself into a target dummy
column10: 错误：无法将玩家转化为伤害测试假人

column2: Error: Unable to transform a target dummy into a target dummy
column10: 错误：无法将伤害测试假人转化为伤害测试假人

column2: Right-click to replace held wand with convenient wand
column10: 右键替换手中法杖为神杖
双玻璃大炮 + 刀尖舔血

column2: Hold Ctrl to fly faster. Hold Shift to fly through walls.\nUnfortunately, holding Ctrl and Shift at the same time does not make you fly through walls faster,\nbecause Ctrl + Shift + S and Ctrl + Shift + W has been taken by Component Explorer mod
column10: 按住 Ctrl 以更快的速度飞行，按住 Shift 可以穿墙飞行\n遗憾的是，同时按住 Ctrl 和 Shift 并不能让你以更快的速度穿墙飞行，\n因为组件浏览器模组已经占用了 Ctrl + Shift + S 和 Ctrl + Shift + W。

column2: Also note that in Debug mode holding Ctrl doesn't do anything
column10: 此外请注意，如果开启游戏的 Debug 模式，按住 Ctrl 只会使你停下。

column2: The number of wands on this page has reached the maximum of 100
column10: 本页法杖数量已达上限

column2: Load Selected Wand Into Held Wand
column10: 加载所选法杖至手持法杖

column2: Hold Ctrl to show wand stats
column10: 按住 Ctrl 显示法杖属性

column2: Tips: Left/right clicking on a value increases/decreases the stat by the value
column10: 提示：左键/右键点击数值可以使相应的属性增加/减少这个数值

column2: The capacity you are setting for your wand is not enough for holding the spells in it. Press Shift and click again to confirm.
column10: 当前设置的法杖容量不足以容纳法杖中法术，若仍要继续，请按住 Shift 并再次点击

column2: Save Selected Spells As A Group
Load Selected Spell Group Into Held Wand
column10: 加载所选法术组合至法杖

column2: Left-click to select this spell group

column10: 法术 $0 已放入你的物品栏

column2: Ctrl + Shift + Click to demote this spell
column10: Ctrl + Shift + 点击以取消始终施放

column2: Spell Demotion Failed: No space for the demoted spell in wand
column10: 取消始终施放失败：法杖中没有空间放置法术

column2: Tips: Ctrl + Shift + Click to relock an unlocked spell
column10: 提示：Ctrl + Shift + 点击可重新锁定已解锁的法术

column2:
Left-click: Select
Right-click: Deselect
Ctrl + Click: Multiple selection
Ctrl + Alt + Left-click/Right-click: Expand selection on the left/right side 
Alt + Click: 
    If clicked slot is not selected: swap selected spell(s) to clicked slot(s)
    If clicked slot is selected: cycle selected spells
    If right-clicked, spells in clicked slots will get replaced instead of swapped away
The above shortcuts also work in the wand box
Alt + Shift + Click: Duplicate Spell(s)
Shift + Left-click: Delete spell
Shift + Right-click: Delete spell and its slot
Ctrl + Shift + Left-click/Right-click: Promote/Demote always-cast spell
Backspace: Delete a spell to the left
Delete: Delete a spell to the right
Ctrl + Z: Undo
Ctrl + Y: Redo
column10:
左键：选中
右键：取消选中
Ctrl + 点击：选中多个
Ctrl + Alt + 左键/右键：扩展左边/右边的选区至此处
Alt + 点击：
    若点击槽位未选中：将已选择法术交换至此处
    若点击槽位已选中：轮换已选择法术
    以上若为右键点击，则不会交换而是覆盖原有法术
以上快捷键也可在法杖仓库页面使用
Alt + Shift + 点击：复制法术
Shift + 左键：删除法术
Shift + 右键：删除法术及其槽位
Ctrl + Shift + 左键/右键：设置/取消始终施放
Backspace：向左删除法术
Delete：向右删除法术
Ctrl + Z：撤销操作
Ctrl + Y：恢复操作

column2: Recently Used\nTips: Shift + Right-click to clear
column10: 最近使用\n提示: Shift + 右键清空
按 [E] 修复法术实验室

column2: Shift + Click to confirm deletion\nClick again to cancel deletion
column10: Shift + 点击 确认删除\n再次点击取消
